name: KABOOM
description: A script to create explosions that move objects! Operated through chat commands or through API calls from other scripts.

useroptions.name: GM only
useroptions.description: Select this box if you want your script to be enabled for GMs only.

useroptions.name: Explosion ratio
useroptions.description: The explosion ratio is used to determine the area of effect of each explosion if a maximum range isn't specified. The script multiplies the minimum range by this number (I suggest keeping it close to 2).

useroptions.name: Default layer to affect
useroptions.description: By default, the script only affects things on one layer. If an object isn't specified when calling KABOOM (like during a position based explosion), then this layer will be used.

useroptions.name: Affect drawings only
useroptions.description: Select this box if you want to only move graphics designated as drawings.

useroptions.name: Dynamic Lighting walls stop movement
useroptions.description: Select this box if you want the script to obey walls on the dynamic lighting layer (and stop movement at them).
